dt: {bc}of, relating to, affecting, or occurring in the lungs

et: Latin {it}pulmonarius{/it}, from {it}pulmon-, pulmo{/it} lung; akin to Greek {it}pleumōn{/it} lung, Sanskrit {it}kloman{/it} right lung
shortdef: of, relating to, affecting, or occurring in the lungs

dt: {bc}an artery that conveys venous blood from the heart to the lungs {dx}see {dxt|heart|heart|illustration}{/dx}

shortdef: an artery that conveys venous blood from the heart to the lungs

dt: {bc}the passage of blood from the right side of the heart through arteries to the lungs where it picks up oxygen and is returned to the left side of the heart by veins

shortdef: the passage of blood from the right side of the heart through arteries to the lungs where it picks up oxygen and is returned to the left side of the heart by veins

dt: {bc}a valveless vein that returns oxygenated blood from the lungs to the heart

shortdef: a valveless vein that returns oxygenated blood from the lungs to the heart

dt: {bc}pulmonary disease (such as emphysema or chronic bronchitis) that is characterized by chronic typically irreversible airway obstruction resulting in a slowed rate of exhalation

shortdef: pulmonary disease (such as emphysema or chronic bronchitis) that is characterized by chronic typically irreversible airway obstruction resulting in a slowed rate of exhalation —abbreviation COPD
